mapper.insert:
SELECT providedGoodId_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO providedGoods_tb(providedGoodId, extraInfoId, providedGood) VALUES(#{providedGoodId}, #{extraInfoId}, #{providedGood})
mapper.update: UPDATE providedGoods_tb SET providedGood = #{providedGood} WHERE extraInfoId = #{extraInfoId} AND providedGoodId = #{providedGoodId}
mapper.select: SELECT extraInfoId, providedGoodId, providedGood FROM providedGoods_tb WHERE extraInfoId = #{extraInfoId}
SELECT extraInfoId, providedGoodId, providedGood FROM providedGoods_tb WHERE providedGoodId = #{providedGoodId}
